analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_contracts/0x0dc6a7d4b4f3165abbae838bf9d51e6c0993cb6f.sol:
	Contract NextToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_contracts/0x0dc6a7d4b4f3165abbae838bf9d51e6c0993cb6f.sol#242-243)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Expirable.isExpired (/unique_contracts/0x0dc6a7d4b4f3165abbae838bf9d51e6c0993cb6f.sol#6-12) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > expireAfter (/unique_contracts/0x0dc6a7d4b4f3165abbae838bf9d51e6c0993cb6f.sol#8-9)
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_contracts/0x0dc6a7d4b4f3165abbae838bf9d51e6c0993cb6f.sol#65-68) is not in mixedCase
